No fees. Make sure you transfer from you bank card (use as a credit card) and deposit the same way. was free, secure, and easy to use and I could send money so easily. However, they recently got rid of one of the more important features for me.... ADDING MONEY TO GOOGLE WALLET. that was a great way for me to not only save but to have separate money for sending to others but now I can't add money to the account.
